room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Just incredible, the immersion alone, Prison Break was by far the best escape room I have ever done!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had a wonderful experience with the family escaping a prison cell. It was a beautifully mind-boggling time that promotes family togetherness and quick thinking. Although we did not escape, we learned to work as a team and use clues to get the job done. A great trip for anyone. Would most definitely recommend to anyone looking for a fun, challenging adventure.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Had an awesome time with my family! Rooms were smartly staged. Very fun and challenging experience. Thankful for the assistance of staff, particularly, Richard. Will definitely return.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We chose the prison break only to later find out right before we were starting it was one of the hardest ones. It was a blast! I had the best time ever and will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Wow...! What an Amazing time...! Where do I start? The staff was amazing, knowledgeable, fun, and courteous..! The Prison Break was a daunting task... you will love it...!If you and your family are fun and adventurous, then I recommend this highly...! And if you have Courtney to welcome you and Nathaniel to Guide you, You are Guaranteed a Blast..!You should definitely come and play Playground with Game Guide Richard Boone...!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I had a awesome first experience at an escape room, so glad we picked this one! The staff was great, attentive, and super friendly. We did 2 rooms, prison break and special ops. The prison break room was the most difficult(we didn't escape) and special ops was pretty difficult as well( we escaped!) Overall it was a great experience and I hope to be returning soon!
